name: SpeedFaster: A PS1 Style Racer
description:
I made this game in two weeks for the "My First Game Jam: Summer 2021" and I enjoyed making it and I hope you enjoy playing it. :)

This game will receive updates in the future.

The Tree Models & Textures >> https://elegantcrow.itch.io/psx-retro-style-tree-pack

I made this game because I see a lot of PS1-style games but most of them are all horror games (like most of itch.io) and I thought racing games were probably one of the most important genres on the platform and I thought more PS1-style racers should exist.
